entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • I found an issue related to parentheses within a query in entity framework core. #33026
  • Incompatibility with Dbcontext, DbFunction and Interface #33025
  • Update command order with computed columns and unique constraints #33023
  • I found an issue related to parentheses within a query in entity framework #33024
  • Some unneeded columns are still not pruned in OPENJSON WITH #33022
  • Infinity loop when joining entities #33021
  • Query: improve exception message we throw when trying to use Include on a complex type #33018

Closed

  • Missing package README file #31947
    8.0.3
  • String properties with indexes are compared case insensitively on SQL Server #32898
    8.0.3
  • Owned entity on genericly typed entity generates unwanted steps in new migrations #32763
    8.0.3
  • Exception when using FromSql on entity with ComplexProperty #32699
    8.0.3
  • Constructor calls when using inheritance with owned entities causes exceptions #31353
    8.0.3
  • IndexOutOfRange for EntityEntry.GetDatabaseValues() with complex type and TPH #32701
    8.0.3
  • Dotnet-ef mismatch causes apply Entity Framework migration fails when publishing an individual web app. #32782
    8.0.3
  • NullReferenceException in Get-Migration in EF Core 8 #32732
    8.0.3
  • SQL Server Migrations - SqlOperation.Sql is stripped of all empty lines #32730
    8.0.3
  • Query never returns when DB value for column mapped to primitive collection is '' #32896
    8.0.3
  • Using SqliteConnection from an ASP.NET MVC (.NET Framework) application results in a few different exceptions #32614
    8.0.3
  • Skip Navigation issue with Many to Many join #32857
  • Migration class name can clash with column data types #32983
  • Unable to create a 'DbContext' of type ''. The exception 'Unable to resolve service for type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbContextOptions`1[Project3.Data.TestContext]' while attempting to activate 'Project3.Data.TestContext'.' was thrown while attempting to create an instance. For the different patterns supported at design time #32936
  • [Microsoft.Data.Sqlite] iOS apps are terminated every time they enter the background if they share an encrypted database with an app extension #32863
  • [Question] Configuring json columns #32858

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Fix OPENJSON postprocessing with split query (#32978) #33027
  • Fix to #32911 - ComplexProperty with AsSplitQuery #33020

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #33019
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #33017
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Update branding to 7.0.17 #33015
  • [release/8.0] Stop using case-insensitive comparisons for indexed properties (#32899) #32919
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Stop specifying incorrect column name in snapshot for owned type of generic entity type #32963
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Add complex type mappings to the default relational mappings #32901
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Handle complex types in GetDatabaseValues #32894
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Use the unpatched shared framework as the minimum requirement for tools. #32869
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Don't assume that FK of skip navigation is non-null #32925
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Stop stripping new lines from migration script literals (#32788) #32851
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Throw for empty strings in primitive collection columns #32928
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3
